FuncDef: The display efm link-event local command displays statistics about local link events.
CLIs: display efm link-event local { all | interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } | master | ap-id <ap-id> }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics about local link events on all interfaces.
-

Displays statistics about local link events on a specified interface.
-

Displays all physical interfaces' local link event statistics on a master.
-

Displays local link event statistics of a port-extend interface for a specified AP on a master.
The value is an integer ranging from 1024 to 8191.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display efm link-event local interface gigabitethernet1/0/1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a device is enabled to detect bit errors, errored frames, and errored frame seconds, run the display efm link-event local command to view statistics about local link events.
Prerequisites
EFM OAM has been enabled globally and on an interface, and bit error detection, errored frame detection, and errored frame second detection have been enabled on the interface.
Precautions
After the display efm link-event local command is run, a hyphen (-) is displayed if bit error detection, errored frame detection, and errored frame second detection are not configured in the interface view.
